name: NeoNDash (Arledi)
description:
A platformer game that has a dashing ability. This game took me about 3-5 days. I may expand on this project. If I do decide to expand on this project I will start with adding a shop, currency, and boss fights. Update: I have added a bossfight and 2 more levels currency and shop may not be added.

Made in Construct 3.
